mapper.sql: t_comp_house_achievement.money as money, t_comp_house_achievement.id as compHouseAchievementId, t_comp_house_achievement.comp_id as compHouseAchievementCompId, compHouseAchievementSecurityOfficer, t_comp_house_achievement.security_officer_certificate_num as compHouseAchievementSecurityOfficerCertificateNum, t_comp_house_achievement.security_officer_id_num as compHouseAchievementSecurityOfficerIdNum, t_comp_house_achievement.standard_worker as compHouseAchievementStandardWorker, t_comp_house_achievement.standard_worker_certificate_num as compHouseAchievementStandardWorkerCertificateNum, t_comp_house_achievement.standard_worker_id_num as compHouseAchievementStandardWorkerIdNum, t_comp_house_achievement.material_man as compHouseAchievementCreateTime, t_comp_house_achievement.update_time as compHouseAchievementUpdateTime, t_comp_house_achievement.is_active as compHouseAchievementIsActive, t_company.comp_type as companyCompType, t_company.industry_type as companyIndustryType, t_company.comp_name as companyCompName
mapper.select:
select
from t_comp_house_achievement, t_company where t_comp_house_achievement.id = #{id} and t_comp_house_achievement.comp_id = t_company.id

select
from t_comp_house_achievement, t_company where t_comp_house_achievement.comp_id = t_company.id order by t_comp_house_achievement.update_time desc, t_comp_house_achievement.create_time desc

select
from t_comp_house_achievement, t_company
order by
${query.sortColumn} ${query.sortOrder}
t_comp_house_achievement.update_time desc, t_comp_house_achievement.create_time desc
